survey_name: Cloud Storage Usage and Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user preferences, satisfaction levels, and challenges related to cloud storage services to help improve service offerings.

questions.question_text: Which cloud storage service(s) do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections as users may use more than one service.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.

script.question_text: Which cloud storage service(s) do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary cloud storage service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected at least one service in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.
